credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Balustrade at top of a flight of stairs
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
description: Horizontal rectangle. Five stairs lead to a landing bordered in front, at right, by a balustrade. The mason's work of the first section, the first embedded baluster and the first free one, and the second sections are executed. Partly colored background.
name: Drawing
